name: Bottomless Pit (In-Progress Prototype)
description:
This prototype is made on Godot Engine. My goal is to make a 2d rogue-like platformer game. Since I only finished the character's running and stationary animation, it's still going to take some time for me to finish making this game entirely and modify it. This prototype will require Godot Engine to start!

The assets from the game are:

1. Warrior-Free Animation set V1.3 by Clembod (itch.io) created by Clembod

2. The Dungeon Pack - Parallax Background by Pixfinity (itch.io) created by Pixfinity

I will be editing if more of these fantastic free assets are used.
